alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Broward and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, or 17 miles south of Belle Glade, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holey Land Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County
